title: Uefa | South China Morning Post

TOPIC
/ company
Uefa
The Union of European Football Associations is the governing body for football in Europe. Founded in 1954, it consists of 54 national members and runs international and club competitions such as the European Championship, Champions League and Europa League.
Chairman / President
Aleksander Čeferin
CEO / Managing Director
Karl-Erik Nilsson
CFO / Finance Director
David Gill
Industry
Sports entertainment
Website
uefa.com
Headquarters address
Route de Genève 46, 1260 Nyon, Switzerland
Year founded
1954
